summary: Thieves Guild, Dark Brotherhood & Nightingale items revamp. The mod changes most of the enchantments on the items from each of the crimes factions in Skyrim and adds 3 items to the Nightingale faction.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Crime Guilds Revamp
[/size][/font]
[/u][/b][/center][size=3]Remember that thief/assassin build you did "only once"?
Remember how after getting to level 100 in Enchanting and made yourself an assassin set and thought to yourself:
"Wow, this set is nothing compared to the Guild master's/Nightingale/Shrouded set! I'm just gonna throw the set [b]I [/b]made away because they are so much better!!!"
No. I don't. Because let's be honest, those sets are a bit... well a tad... who are we kidding, they [/size][color=#00ffff][size=4][b]suck[/b][/size][/color][size=3]!

Most the sets' items have only one enchantment which you can get a better one even at level 50 enchantment.

This mod's intent is to change the overall usage of the items from the various crime guilds - The Thieves Guild, The Dark Brotherhood & The Nightingales.[/size]
author: DMan1629
